snippet: To ensure that award voters see its movie before the early onset of Oscar voting, Universal Pictures is holding a series of screenings of "Les Misérables" in Los Angeles and New York.
abstract: To ensure that award voters see its movie before the early onset of Oscar voting, Universal Pictures is holding a series of screenings of "Les Misérables" in Los Angeles and New York.

headline.main: Racing to the Screening Room to Outpace Oscar Rivals
headline.print_headline: Racing to the Screening Room To Outpace Oscar Rivals
